name: Skinny
description:
Skinny is a horror game.
You were driving midnight cars with your daughter Anna. There was a place to go. But you've had a weird car accident. And when he woke up, Anna was gone.
You stayed in town to find her.
Strange things happen in town. There's a thing named Skinny here.
You have to unravel the whole mystery and find your daughter. But watch out for time.
You can find the gun and neutralize the skinny. But this won't last long, he'il come back.
You should consider your time very well.
You can hide in the lockers. You can hide in the car. You can skip down the roof of the house.
Run your camera and look around carefully. some things just appear to the camera. But don't finish the battery!
